LocaleLayout.title: Dead Frontier 2 Helper
LocaleLayout.description: Dead Frontier 2 Helper is a website that provides information about the game Dead Frontier 2. It is a work in progress and will be updated regularly.

HomePage.title: Home
HomePage.description: Welcome to Dead Frontier 2 Helper. This website provides some useful tools to help you with the problems you encounter in the game.

PuzzlePage.title: Puzzle
PuzzlePage.description: The puzzle page provides some puzzle games solvers. You can use them to solve the puzzles in the game.

binary.title: Binary
binary.description: Convert the binary code to the correct number.

letters.title: Letters
letters.description: Convert the number to the correct letter.

morse.title: Morse Code
morse.description: Convert the morse code to the correct number or letter.

light-out.title: Light Out
light-out.description: Solve the puzzle by turning on all the lights.

sliding.title: Sliding
sliding.description: Solve the puzzle by sliding the figures.
